body:
So uh... I made Glitchy a house on frostbite today... It got destroyed many times because of the diamond red spawn killers :/ also idiotic team griefers, etc. But I finally finished it with a little help from Snowcone202 and puffycloud! This shows all five pictures I took so here they are!
http://imgur.com/0yaS5yr,r3TUeJM,53axBUd,UwuctOl,8sW8QQK

title: I made a shrine to Glitchy

replies.body: If you want to laugh you have to zoom in to read the signs :P
replies.body_tagged: If you want to laugh you have to zoom in to read the signs :P

replies.body: I love it <3. like puffy said the griefers were annoying but Me,U , puffy, and a lot of other people fixed it! (I made 2 of the signs)
